com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal

Class YRCUIInitializer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.yantra.yfc.rcp.internal.YRCUIInitializer

  • public class YRCUIInitializer
extends java.lang.Object
    YRCUIInitializer is the UI Data Loader class which initializes the following entities,
    • User Locale
    • Data Types Definition
    • Data Type Map
    • User Groups
    • User Details
    • User DB Localized Data
    • User Menu Hierarchy For User
    • User Resources
    • Double Quantity Display Format
    • Currency List
